skills.name: JUDGEMENT
desc: • Deals 3 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• 33% Chance to Stun the target for 1 turn.

skills.name: REDEMPTION
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• Lowers Accuracy of enemies for 2 turns.
• 35% Chance to Heal Block for 2 turns.

skills.name: WORLD OF NIGHTMARES
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
